destinations.description: Experience the Great Migration and witness the Big Five in their natural habitat.
Explore the vast plains and see the wildlife in one of Africa's most famous national parks.
Embark on game drives and guided walks to spot the diverse wildlife of Kruger.
Navigate through the waterways of the delta and encounter its rich biodiversity.

Witness the shimmering salt pans and abundant wildlife in Etosha.
Cruise along the Chobe River and see elephants, hippos, and crocodiles.
Marvel at the majestic Mount Kilimanjaro backdrop and its resident elephants.
Explore the towering dunes and unique desert-adapted wildlife of Namibia.
Embark on a trek to encounter endangered mountain gorillas in their natural habitat.
Descend into the world's largest intact volcanic caldera and witness diverse wildlife.
Experience walking safaris and night drives in one of Africa's best wildlife sanctuaries.
Trek through dense forests to encounter the magnificent mountain gorillas.
Discover Zimbabwe's largest national park known for its elephant herds and predators.

Discover Tanzania's largest national park known for its rugged landscapes and predators.
